import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import "./App.css" import { Link, Route, Routes } from "react-router-dom" import { Home } from "./pages/Home" import { NewClimber } from "./pages/NewClimber" import { ClimberList } from "./pages/ClimberList" import { SearchClimber } from "./pages/SearchClimber" import { NotFound } from "./pages/NotFound" import { FoundClimber } from "./pages/FoundClimber" import { AddedClimber } from "./pages/AddedClimber" import data from "./data/Climbers.JSON" export default function App() { const [climbers, setClimbers] = useState(() => { const loadedData = JSON.stringify(data) return JSON.parse(loadedData) }) useEffect (() => { localStorage.setItem("CLIMBERS", JSON.stringify(climbers)) },[climbers]) function addClimber(name,surename,age) { setClimbers(currentClimbers => { return [ ...currentClimbers, { id: climbers?.length ? climbers[climbers.length - 1].id + 1 : 1 , name:name, surename:surename, age:age}, ] }) } return ( <>
  • New Climber
  • Climber List
  • Search Climber
}> }> }> }> }> }> }> ) }
